name: greatest film of all time
reviewBody: Okay now I love this film.I worship this film.It was the first movie I ever saw.I have seen this film over 500 times (it is true because I do nothing but watch movies,and I first saw this movie when I was 2) The movie is amazing.The sets are elaborate and dark.Gotham city is like a darker,more violent New York City.I can't believe that for Batman Forever & Batman and Robin they had all thee colorful lights going everywhere and even Batman driving on the arm of a huge naked man statue.Give me a break.Michael Keaton does a 30+ thumbs up performance as the "dark knight".You can tell he has demons.Jack Nicholson also does a 30+ thumbs up as The Joker......I can't get enough of this film I own it on : VHS (2 copies) dvd(2 copies) and I have a Batman mask(good quality)from Batman Returns (equally good) watch this film
